snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls Blades – Nintendo Switch Reveal Trailer | E3 2019
snippet.description: Carry over all your progress from the mobile version or start a new adventure from scratch. Playable in docked or tablet mode, Blades on Switch takes advantage of the platform’s unique Joy-Cons and motion controls to support a variety of playstyles.
